top.geek_studio.chenlongcould.musicplayer.helper

类 StopWatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.geek_studio.chenlongcould.musicplayer.helper.StopWatch

  • public class StopWatch
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple thread safe stop watch. 简单的线程安全秒表。
    作者:
    Karim Abou Zeid (kabouzeid)

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private boolean isRunning
      Whether the stop watch is currently running or not.
      private long previousElapsedTime
      The time elapsed before the current startTime.
      private long startTime
      The time the stop watch was last started.

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts or continues the stop watch.
        另请参阅:
        pause(), reset()

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses the stop watch. It can be continued later from start().
        另请参阅:
        start(), reset()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Stops and resets the stop watch to zero milliseconds.
        另请参阅:
        start(), pause()

      • getElapsedTime

        public final long getElapsedTime()
        返回:
        the total elapsed time in milliseconds

      • toString

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
